phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
The Eye of the Midnight Sun arrived at the Witches' Forest,
Wanting to take advantage of the chaos they were causing,
the Diamond Kingdom came to steal the Queen of Witches' secret.
Guess I will just have to kill this chick first!
Your lessons got through to me.
Fanzell's former student Mars, who was still in the Diamond Kingdom's army,
decided he would side with him.
As Ladros said, we are traitors.
I am on your side, Master.
I do not know what is going on, but okay!
By taking advantage of Asta's anti-magic, they successfully defeated Ladros.
But the moment they tried to finish off Fana of the Eye of the Midnight Sun's Third Eye,
who was weakened by Noelle's spell...
Fana, who had lost her memories,
fell into a deeper state of confusion and tried to self-destruct, but...
Asta and Mars risked their lives to stop her.
Let us go see the world together!
Those Who Boost Each Other Up
I could not have done it without you.
There is no reason for the weak to stand on the battlefield.
I was born to break people like you.
The weak will perish, and only the strong will remain.
Someone as naIve as you cannot win against me!
I am glad you were able to save your childhood friend!
So you made a friend in the outside world!
No, I would not say he is
Yeah, he is totally my friend!
I am glad you calmed down, too.
Why do you have to do such drastic things every single time?!
Were you born just to try to kill yourself?!
You barely have any clothes on!
Your powers exist to protect others.
I am so glad you are both alive.
I can hardly believe she is started breathing again.
Is this the power of the magic that bears the Phoenix's name?
We will fit Fana with a mage stone, too.
Not only did it fail to increase her magic, but she hardly has any left.
I guess that was the last dying ember of it.
She is of no interest to me anymore.
It is just as it was long ago.
As you wish, I shall destroy them.
I do not have any memories after that.
It felt as though someone else entered my body.
All I remember is that person's fierce hatred.
What about the third eye and pointy ears you had?
I do not know anything about them.
I had no idea, and I...
Mars, you do not need to feel bad about anything.
I mean, we got to meet again.
I will never let you go again.
Are not things heating up over there?
He is stiffened up as hard as a chunk of ore.
Childhood friends tragically torn apart and reunited by destiny...
Whoa, he is bawling over there!
I am jealous and envious and bummed out!
You do not have any childhood friends?
I do not have any cute childhood friends like that!
Just so you know, I am not jealous!
Why did I just get slapped?!
Anyway, why did the Eye of the Midnight Sun come to the Witches' Forest?
I still feel a strong desire in my head to retrieve the magic stone.
So that means there is a magic stone in this forest?
Let us hurry and go see the Queen of Witches!
No, before that, we need to save Domina, Mariella, and the wounded witches.
His magical power should be gone...
Man, that was some intense magic.
It took forever to absorb it all.
I must admit, I thought I was going to die.
But your magic power should have been depleted.
I emitted it all, and then took it back in.
You rely too much on your magic detection, Teach.
Really, though, why do all of you
keep putting your own lives in danger to protect others?
That is exactly why I am going to end up killing you!
Well, well, some weirdo just showed up.
This does not concern you, so could you get lost?
It is got lots to do with me!
keep putting your own lives in danger to protect others?
That is exactly why I am going to end up killing you!
Well, well, some weirdo just showed up.
This does not concern you, so could you get lost?
It is got lots to do with me!
I need to use a recovery spell!
I am going to pound this guy!
You are that one guy, right?
I totally feel your pain, man.
I was born without a magic attribute myself.
Even when I was a kid, everybody made fun of me and called me bland.
But hey, you are even more worthless than me.
What did you say, you bastard?!
I kind of feel bad for you.
Give me some of your magic, then!
All yours if you can reach.
I think we would make great partners.
You can be my right-hand man.
I will talk to the Diamond Army for you.
Let us rise up through the royal army's ranks together!
We will teach the guys who get all cocky just because they have got talent a lesson!
I am going to make his anti-magic powers all mine, too!
I am going to become the Wizard King of the Clover Kingdom!
This is why I hate idiots!
I heard about how you fight.
Without that spatial magic guy over there,
you cannot do a thing about long-distance spells, can you?
That ricochet trick will not work on me, either.
There is no way you can win!
Who is going to give up?
And you will not get away with that!
There are only two kinds of people in this world: the users and the used.
I won my way to the top by using the people around me.
I am going to use Mars over there
and the girl next to him to get myself even further ahead.
Maybe I will let the military use them for magic research until they die!
You are not letting me get away with this, right?
You can be my stepping stone, too!
All I did was take my eyes off of him for a second!
I would made it to the rank of the Eight Shining Generals!
Did he really just throw this stupidly heavy sword all the way up there?!
What kind of decision was that?
What the hell were you thinking?!
Are you telling me I am going to be taken out by a dumbass attack like this?
I could not have made it this far on my own.
People taught me how to use my power and how to fight.
We got through life or death situations together.
We helped each other out while improving how we fight.
The reason I have been able to react to the attacks
is because of something called ki from back in my homeland.
Where I come from, we have got this saying...
A warrior never goes back on his word.
You said you were going to become the Wizard King, did not you?
Water Creation Magic: Sea Dragon's Cradle!
I am not a failure anymore!
Water Creation Magic: Sea Dragon's Roar!
will end up being incredibly powerful!
I will not let you kill anyone!
My special move was a complete success!
Friends are only meant to be used?
I cannot get it out on my own!
I know how strong you are, so I am not going to get careless!
If I take it out and you attack me, I have no chance of winning!
Besides, if I would missed when I threw it at you, I would have lost!
I am an idiot, so I cannot afford to mess up to begin with!
If it does not come out, I am going to die!
That is not enough to kill anybody!
I missed your vital points on purpose!
I thought I would be able to trick an idiot like him if I
tugged at his heartstrings, but he is not buying it!
This twerp's been through his share of battles!
So I am going to whack you again and knock you out!
This is all of my remaining magic.
If I attack him and he blocks it, I am really finished!
I will just have to use reinforcement magic and force it out!
I have got enough left for two magic bullets...
I do not know how you got those powers,
but use that huge magic of yours right now!
Quit playing dumb, and hurry it up!
Do it or I will kill...
The next shot will really kill him.
I feel like my body's going to burst!
This is the greatest magic I have ever eaten.
It is not an amount a human can emit!
I tracked it with ki, but it was still so fast that I could not dodge it.
I have obtained the ultimate power!
If I use this, the other Eight Shining Generals do not stand a chance!
I can take over the whole kingdom!
I will murder everyone who ever looked down on me!
But before that, I guess I would better finish you off.
I will not get careless again.
I will keep hitting you with ranged attacks that you cannot block...
Since he can use that sword, I thought he might be their descendant, but...
Show me who you really are!
Now, then, how many more shots can that body you are so proud of take?
This is the greatest magic I have ever eaten.
So you are saying that not only do I look old, but my magic tastes old, too?!
Queen of Witches, what did you do to Asta?!
Asta's grimoire is giving off an eerie light.
You almost look like... a demon!
Black Clover, Page 63: It is Nothing.
A black meteor shoots across the sky.
